title: Hi, I’m [Andrea Martin]
text: I’m a student at Cal Poly Pomona majoring in Business Administration with an emphasis in International Business Marketing.I specialize in global market research and cross-cultural consumer behavior.

title: Hi, I’m [Andrea Martin]
text:
About Me
I hold a High School Diploma from Ruben S. Ayala High School and will be graduating Fall of 2025 with a Bachelor’s Degree at Cal Poly Pomona in Business Administration. I also am currently a business owner and founder of @_nailsbydre_ on instagram.

title: Hi, I’m [Andrea Martin]
text:
Let’s Connect
You can email me or connect on LinkedIn.

Welcome to my portfolio.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
Below are selected highlights that showcase how I’ve used marketing analytics to grow my nail brand and attract a loyal clientele. These experiences reflect my ability to combine creative content, social media insights, and strategic planning to drive real results.
From crafting Instagram strategies to tracking post performance and understanding what my audience responds to, each effort is grounded in using data to turn engagement into bookings and awareness into brand growth.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You’ll Find

Instagram Performance Analysis: Measuring how posts, reels, and stories contribute to engagement and client bookings.
Content Strategy & Scheduling: Using analytics to time posts for maximum visibility and reach.
Brand Growth & Awareness: Leveraging trends, hashtags, and audience data to consistently grow my following and build trust.
Client Insights: Tracking patterns in engagement and inquiries to understand what services and styles attract the most attention.

title: Professional Summary
Social Media Engagement Analysis
text:
Overview
This analysis examined engagement metrics across multiple social media platforms to identify content trends, audience preferences, and posting strategies that drive performance.




Learning Outcomes

Aggregate and clean social media data.

Identify high-performing content formats.

Understand audience behavior and peak times.

Support social strategy with data-backed recommendations.

Visualize results in an executive summary.




Key Skills Gained

Social analytics

Platform metric APIs

Content performance tracking

Audience insights

Strategic planning

title: Brand Grwoth & Awareness
text:
Overview
In this project, I explore how I’ve been strategically growing my Instagram account, nailsbydre, by tapping into trends, optimizing hashtag use, and analyzing my audience’s behavior. My goal isn’t just to gain followers—it’s to build trust and lasting loyalty through relevant, engaging, and meaningful content.




Learning Outcomes

Understand growth patterns using my own follower analytics.
Use trending hashtags and content formats to boost visibility.
Analyze engagement data to understand what resonates with my audience.
Apply trend and theme mapping to inspire content ideas.
Build a consistent and trustworthy presence on Instagram




Key Skills Gained

Hashtag and trend analysis
Follower behavior insights
Audience segmentation
Content planning for brand growth
Community-building through authenticity

title: Résumé
text:
You can view a PDF version of my résumé here.

Professional Summary
Marketing-focused business owner with a proven track record in brand development, digital engagement, and customer experience. Demonstrates expertise in designing targeted marketing campaigns, analyzing consumer behavior, and managing end-to-end digital presence to boost visibility and client growth. Adept at using social media and CRM tools to cultivate loyal customer bases, generate leads, and drive measurable revenue. Combines entrepreneurial initiative with corporate retail experience to deliver results-driven marketing strategies and memorable brand experiences.


Technical Skills

Programming Languages: R, Python, SQL, etc.
Web Technologies: HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, Quarto, CMS Platforms, Analytics Tools



Education









Degree
Year
College / Department
Institution




Bachelor in Science in Business Administration-Marketing
2021 – 2025
Business Administration
Cal Poly Pomona





Work Experience

[Sales Associate], [Palm Beach Tan]
[May 2020 – June 2022]

Sold tanning products and memberships by assessing customer needs and recommending personalized solutions
Utilized POS systems and CRM tools to track customer preferences and manage sales
Consistently exceeded monthly sales goals, contributing to a 25% increase in product revenue during peak seasons
Trained new employees on sales techniques and customer service protocols
Demonstrated strong communication and consultative selling skills



[Sales Associate], [Disneyland Resort]
[August 2022- December 2023]

Led a visual merchandising project to enhance guest experience and increase product visibility
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including inventory, visual merchandising, and guest services
Managed sales transactions and supported seasonal promotional campaigns
Contributed guest feedback and sales insights to improve retail strategy
Helped maintain high customer satisfaction through responsive, friendly service



[Founder & Nail Technician], [nailsbydre]
[October 2020 – May 2025]

Led the launch and ongoing growth of a personal brand offering nail services, focusing on quality, creativity, and client satisfaction.
Collaborated with suppliers, managed bookings, and maintained client relationships through social media and scheduling tools.
Managed marketing campaigns, service menus, and business operations, contributing to consistent monthly revenue growth.
Contributed to strategic planning by analyzing trends, adjusting offerings, and maintaining strong customer retention rates.

title: Content Strategy & Scheduling
text:
Overview
This project analyzes Instagram analytics for nailsbydre to uncover optimal posting times and content patterns that drive visibility and reach. By aligning posts with audience behavior, this strategy boosts engagement and streamlines content planning.




Learning Outcomes

Understand follower activity trends and peak engagement times
Analyze how day-of-week and time-of-day affect visibility.
Improve consistency and planning in content rollout.
Build a scheduling strategy based on real performance insights




Key Skills Gained

Content calendar development
Instagram timing analytics
Engagement pattern recognition
Strategic content scheduling
Strategy development

title: Client Insights
text:
Overview
In this project, I dive into engagement patterns, comments, and inquiry data from my Instagram account nailsbydre to understand what services and nail styles attract the most attention. By identifying what resonates most with my audience—whether it’s French tips, chrome designs, or seasonal themes—I can tailor my offerings and content to client demand.




Learning Outcomes

Analyze engagement trends by nail style and service.
Track which content types drive DMs and booking inquiries.
Understand client interest through saves, comments, and shares.
Align visual content with what clients want most.
Use data to shape service menu updates and marketing




Key Skills Gained

Service-based content analytics
DM and inquiry tracking
Trend-based content refinement
Data-informed client strategy
Style preference mapping

title: Instagram Performance Dashboard
text:
Overview
This dashboard project tracks and visualizes key Instagram performance metrics for the nailsbydre account. It provides insight into audience growth, content engagement, post performance, and profile reach. The goal is to better understand what resonates with followers, enhance content strategy, and grow the nailsbydre brand.




Learning Outcomes

Visualize and monitor key marketing metrics.

Analyze performance trends across multiple campaigns.

Identify high- and low-performing segments.

Communicate insights through interactive visuals.

Improve personal branding through evidence-based social strategy.




Key Skills Gained

Instagram analytics interpretation

Data storytelling for personal branding
Dashboard design and layout
Content performance optimization
Strategic social media planning

title: Strategic Marketing
text: Below is a selected project that showcased my work in strategic marketing. This example highlights how I apply leadership, data-informed decision making, and creative direction to drive marketing success.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 1: Strategic Campaign Planning]
In this project, I led the development of a comprehensive marketing campaign for [product, service, or initiative]. From audience segmentation to messaging strategy, I managed the full lifecycle of the campaign, aligning it with business objectives and measurable KPIs.
Skills Demonstrated:

Marketing Strategy: Defined objectives and tactics for maximum impact.
Team Coordination: Oversaw collaboration across creative, data, and channel teams.
Performance Tracking: Implemented real-time metrics and post-campaign analysis.
Brand Positioning: Ensured consistency across all touchpoints.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 2: Brand Audit & Positioning]
This initiative involved conducting a full brand audit for [organization or brand], evaluating its current market perception, competitive landscape, and customer engagement. I synthesized insights into a refreshed brand strategy and visual identity recommendations.
Skills Demonstrated:

Brand Analysis: Audited messaging, tone, and visual identity.
Competitive Benchmarking: Evaluated brand positioning within the market.
Strategic Communication: Developed new value propositions and storytelling elements.
Stakeholder Presentation: Delivered recommendations to senior leadership.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 3: Product Launch Go-to-Market Plan]
For the release of [new product/service], I created a go-to-market (GTM) strategy from scratch. This included customer journey mapping, channel mix planning, and launch timeline coordination.
Skills Demonstrated:

Go-to-Market Strategy: Developed a clear launch roadmap aligned with buyer needs.
Integrated Marketing: Orchestrated email, paid ads, social, and on-site promotions.
Budget Management: Allocated resources efficiently across tactics.
Launch Optimization: Tracked performance and refined tactics in real time.

Below is an embedded demonstration of the interactive report:

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 4: Client Consulting & Campaign Optimization]
I collaborated with a client to assess and optimize their existing marketing efforts. Through audits, persona development, and campaign refinement, I helped improve ROI and audience engagement.
Skills Demonstrated:

Client Consulting: Provided clear insights and strategic guidance.
Persona Development: Built target personas to guide messaging.
Campaign Optimization: Identified and addressed areas of underperformance.
Data-Driven Adjustments: Leveraged analytics to refine tactics.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Influencer Engagement]
In this project, I collaborated with a sports/ beauty influencer to increase brand awareness and extend my reach on social platforms. By offering a complimentary nail service in exchange for content, I strategically positioned my business in front of a highly engaged audience on TikTok.

Learning Outcomes

Identified and reached out to an influencer whose audience aligned with my target clients.
Negotiated a mutually beneficial exchange: nail service for social media exposure.
Prepared a visually appealing, trendy nail design tailored to her aesthetic.
Monitored engagement metrics from the resulting TikTok post.
Measured referral traffic and inquiries attributed to the collaboration.

:::



Key Skills Gained

Influencer outreach strategy
Content-based brand leveraging
Collaboration negotiation and planning
Engagement tracking and impact analysis
Creative brand presentation for social content
